title: Inefficient fetch of deposits and blocks
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

On start-up eth1 module does a lot of fetches for apparently very little data

```
Sep-07 14:07:48.349[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539501, toBlock=7539501
Sep-07 14:07:48.435[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539502, toBlock=7539533
Sep-07 14:07:48.556[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539533, toBlock=7539533
Sep-07 14:07:48.642[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539534, toBlock=7539565
Sep-07 14:07:48.799[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539565, toBlock=7539565
Sep-07 14:07:48.907[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539566, toBlock=7539597
Sep-07 14:07:49.034[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539597, toBlock=7539597
Sep-07 14:07:49.151[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539598, toBlock=7539629
Sep-07 14:07:49.476[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539629, toBlock=7539629
Sep-07 14:07:49.608[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539630, toBlock=7539661
Sep-07 14:07:49.803[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539661, toBlock=7539661
Sep-07 14:07:49.916[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539662, toBlock=7539693
Sep-07 14:07:50.063[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539693, toBlock=7539693
Sep-07 14:07:50.214[eth1]          verbose: Fetched deposits depositCount=0, fromBlock=7539694, toBlock=7539725
Sep-07 14:07:50.439[eth1]          verbose: Fetched eth1 blocks blockCount=1, fromBlock=7539725, toBlock=7539725
```

According to metrics it does 0.5 calls per sec to fetch 0.5 blocks per sec. The deposit block range fetched is very narrow (~30-50). Is this expected behaviour? Looks very wasteful at least for goerli
